text: The cosmos is within us. We are made of star-stuff. We are a way for the universe to know itself.
author: Carl Sagan

text: I have loved the stars too fondly to be fearful of the night.
author: Sarah Williams

text: Look up at the stars and not down at your feet. Try to make sense of what you see, and wonder about what makes the universe exist. Be curious.
author: Stephen Hawking

text: A galaxy is a swirling city of stars, a cosmic whirlpool in the dark.
author: Anonymous

text: The moon is a loyal companion. It never leaves. Itâ€™s always there, watching, steadfast, knowing us in our light and dark moments, changing forever just as we do.
author: Adriana Trigiani
